name: unFROGettable
description:
This is my first game! I made it based on a suggestion from my son. It's just a simple little game with some images of frogs. You memorize them and then one goes missing and you try to remember which one. Despite it's simple concept, it was a lot of work! I'm still working on improving it and would love some feedback.

My TO DO List:

  • Randomize the order in which the frogs are shown to make it more challenging.
  • Add more frog facts.
  • Fix the Sound On/Off button
  • Add frog pictures to the drop down menu
